"Ah, hello there.": "Are your injuries healed?"
"Have you recovered?"
"Aye. No problems there."
"Aye. Apologies for worrying you."
"I'm currently on a patrol mission, actually."
"Patrolling for Starless, in particular."

"They ended up claiming many lives
in that battle the other day..."
"I cannot allow another such tragedy to happen."
"By the way, I heard you helped me out back there."
"I just want to thank you for that."

"I can't believe I made such a
terribly poor show of myself..."
"You saved Aina's life."
"Actually, you were really cool."
"My body just moved on its own."
"Thank goodness Aina is okay..."

"I'm happy to hear you say that,
unconscious though I was for most of it."
"I am glad I was able to protect Aina, though..."
"The blame for not noticing the enemy earlier is mine alone."
"Only when we were given the order to return did I notice something."

"It's thanks to yourself and Aina
that we were able to claim victory that day."

"I couldn't be more embarrassed
by my performance as your senior."

"However, thanks to that battle, we are now
a step closer to understanding the Starless."
"How they move, for one thing."

"I have no intention of making such a
disgraceful blunder again."

"In preparation for their next appearance,
I've been discussing countermeasures with other veteran ARKS."

"From now on, as we become privy to more information,
our tactics should improve accordingly."

"And now that you are a Guardian, I think you should
take on a role of leadership in battle as well."
"Anyways, I should get back to my mission."

"The Starless are a threat.
Keep your wits about you always."
